name: Sweet Sorbet Maker: Tasty Ice Cream Cupcake Maker
name_original: Sweet Sorbet Maker: Tasty Ice Cream Cupcake Maker
description:
Does grape sound good today or will you go rainbow and try them all? Do you like fresh and fruity flavors or tasty vanilla?

Choose your favorite dessert taste and then decorate your snow cone. It’ll cool you down on those hot summer days!

Product Features:
- Snow cone themed dessert salon game.
- Easy to use controls to choose items and decorate.
- Yummy slush flavors to create unique recipes!
- Tons of ways to make your favorite frozen treat!
- Learn how to make cool drinks perfect for summer!
- Try different flavors and mix and match.
- Decorate your snow cone to top it off!
